lines.text: So... they tore open a hole in his chest-
Oh, boy. I know I'm in for a real plausible idea when you lead with that.
Shut up. They tore open a hole in his chest, and then cast <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum.</c>
That froze the hole open, but also froze all the blood and guts and stuff inside, so they didn't come out.
And then, I guess, when the spell wears off, the hole will close up, and-
Yeah, that's definitely how eviscerations work. That'll just close right up.
Okay, okay, you've developed a sense for when I'm making stuff up. Congrats.
